members.description:
Constructor.

Creates a new XMLListCollection object using the specified XMLList object.

by the XMLListCollection object.

values: source The XMLList object containing the data to be represented

members.description: The underlying XMLList for this collection. The XMLListCollection object does not represent any changes that you make directly to the source XMLList object. Always use the XMLListCollection methods to modify the collection.
Calls the attribute() method of each XML object in the XMLList and returns an XMLList of the results, which match the given attributeName. objects of the XMLList.

values: attributeName The attribute that you want to match in the XML
The XMLList of matching XML objects.

members.description: Calls the attributes() method of each XML object in the XMLList object and returns an XMList of attributes for each XML object. the attributes.

values: The XMLList containing the resulting XML objects, listing

members.description: Calls the child() method of each XML object in the XMLList and returns an XMLList containing the children of with the specified property name, in order. original XMLList.

values: An XMLList of matching children of the XML objects in the

members.description: Calls the children() method of each XML object in the XMLList and returns an XMLList containing the results.

values: An XMLList of children of the XML objects in the original XMLList.

members.description: Returns a deep copy of the XMLList object.

values: The copy of the XMLList object.

members.description: Calls the descendants() method of each XML object in the XMLList and returns an XMLList containing the results. The name parameter is passed to the XML object's descendants() method. If you do not specify a parameter, the string "~~" is passed to the descendants() method. etc.) of the XML objects in the original XMLList.

values: name The name of the elements to match.

members.description: Calls the elements() method of each XML object in the XMLList. The name parameter is passed to the XML object's elements() method. If you do not specify a parameter, the string "~~" is passed to the elements() method. original XMLList.

values: name The name of the elements to match.
XMLList of the matching child elements of the XML objects in the

members.description: Calls the text() method of each XML object in the XMLList and returns an XMLList containing the results.

values: The XMLList that contains the result.

members.description:
Returns a string representation of the XMLList by calling the toString() method for each XML object in the XMLList. If the prettyPrinting property of the XML class is set to true, then the results for each XML object in the XMLList are separated by the return character. Otherwise, if prettyPrinting is set to false, then the results are simply concatenated, without separating return characters.

The toString() method strips out the following in the returned string for an XML object that has simple content: the start tag, attributes, namespace declarations, and the end tag. Use the toXMLString() method if you want to preserve these in the returned string for XML objects with simple content.

values: The string representation of the XMLList object.

members.description:
Returns a string representation of the XMLList by calling the toXMLString() method for each XML object in the XMLList. If the prettyPrinting property of the XML class is set to true, then the results for each XML object in the XMLList are separated by the return character. Otherwise, if prettyPrinting is set to false, then the results are concatenated, without separating return characters.

The toXMLString() method preserves the following in the returned string for an XML object that has simple content: the start tag, attributes, namespace declarations, and the end tag. Use the toString() method if you want to strip these from the returned string for XML objects with simple content.

values: The string representation of the XMLList.
